purpose: To enable the development and orchestration of multi-agent systems for natural language programming.
principle: Utilizes a multi-agent framework to coordinate various specialized agents, allowing for complex task execution through natural language inputs.
reusability: Designed as a framework that can be extended and customized for various multi-agent applications; offers modular components for agent development.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; may have limited documentation and stability; primarily experimental with potential for refinement.
